"The Incapacitation Menu":
"Resuming the Game

- Back to Campship: Return to the ship and revive. In special quests this option will be 'Retire' and all quest progress will be lost.

- Use (Buy) Scape Doll to Revive: Revive on the spot by using a Scape Doll (revival item) or buying one with ARKS cash.

"

"- Half Doll:
Upon usage, it will revive oneself and regain half the HP.

- Chat: Chat with party members.

See the Online Manual below for more information:
